com.dealwallet.webdriver.selenium.java

Class SampleHealthCart

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dealwallet.webdriver.selenium.java.SampleHealthCart

  • public class SampleHealthCart
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to scrap the categorise and products from the healthcart.com and store the category details into productfeed_category table and products details into the productfeed_products table.
    Author:
    Tsss-Pc1

        private void pt_nextval(java.sql.Connection con)
        To know the sequence id, we are executing the query in the database table and get the result into Result set and then displaying the Sequence number and finally close the connection.

      • insertProductsDB

        private void insertProductsDB(java.sql.Connection con,
                    java.lang.String asin,
                    java.lang.String url,
                    java.lang.String pgroup,
                    java.lang.String pname,
                    java.lang.String desc)
        This method is used to insert the Product details in to the productfeed_products table.
        Parameters:
        con - it is an object for the connection class.
        asin - it is an asin id for a particular product
        url - it is a product url for a particular product.
        pgroup - it is for a product group of that particular product.
        pname - it is for a product name
        desc - it is for a product description.

      • getCategories

        private void getCategories()
        This method is used to get the categories from the merchent site and save the details into the Database Table. Productfeed_categories table. This method returns nothing.
